description: Try our easy to follow Beef Chilli Con Carne recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beef Chilli Con Carne Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Serve chilli con carne with diced avocado and corn chips. Tip 1: You can freeze the chilli con carne for up to 3 months, thawed overnight in the fridge. Tip 2: Swap corn chips for soft tortillas. Tip 3: For a vegetarian/vegan chilli swap the chorizo and beef with 2 cups grated carrot, add 1 teaspoon paprika and 1 can cannellini beans extra with remaining ingredients, omitting the sour cream.
